content:
Hello @Grahame Grieve

I am trying to post the attached daf-result-example.xml to http://fhir3.healthintersections.com.au/open/ and getting the below error:

I was able to post observations a couple of weeks ago. Please advise.

...quote
<text>
<status value="generated"/>
<div xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
<p>This does not appear to be a FHIR resource (unknown name "Observation") at line -1 col -1</p>
</div>
</text>
<issue>
<severity value="error"/>
<details>
<text value="This does not appear to be a FHIR resource (unknown name "Observation") at line -1 col -1"/>
</details>
...

Hello Graham,

Thank you for restarting the server. I am now able to post observation resources.
